title.value: Collection of winter and summer garlic in vitro
Создание коллекции in vitro чеснока озимого и ярового

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Pavlova, I.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the performed comparative evaluation of infection in samples and variety of winter and summer garlic (Allium sativum L.). There were selected the most promising samples of spring and winter garlic for improvement of planting material. In course of the study there were used samples of clonal nursery garlic of winter form (grade Vitorzhanets, Polessky souvenir, purple - shooting out varieties) and spring form (clones 515; 516; 517; 518 - not shoot out). There was realized the evaluation of the samples for the presence or absence of infection in different organs of garlic when administered to in vitro culture and identification of the optimal type of explants for obtaining maximum regenerated shoots. By the example of the studied collection of garlic it was shown that spring forms were less infected than the winter ones.
